Jolin breaks the glass ceiling again with this album, every song has a unique approach in exploring the beauty and ugliness, each of the song is carefully planned from the lyrics, to the melody, arrangement, music video and even performance. Jolin is brave enough to browse through all her dark history and her dark side, she self-deprecating herself to prove that she is not scared anymore. The juries are invited by the Ministry of Culture of Taiwan to select the winners every year.
